DOC.brief_title: Lifestyle Intervention Improve Insulin Sensitivity Markers Cardiovascular Risk Prostate Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: - In study , participant divide two group . One group undergo intensive lifestyle change ( Lifestyle Intervention Group ) design Diabetes Prevention Group , ( Control Group ) follow guideline healthy live establish Food Guide Pyramid National Cholesterol Education Program . - All visit take place General Clinical Research Center Massachusetts General Hospital . - At initial visit , follow perform : Bionutrition evaluation ; Oral Glucose Tolerance Test ( OGTT ) ; additional blood work ; Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry ( DXA ) Scan . - After initial visit , visit schedule 3 , 6 12 month procedure repeat . - Participants randomize one two study group . Lifestyle Intervention Group : The goal participant assign group achieve maintain weight loss least 7 % initial body weight healthy low calorie , low fat diet engage physical activity moderate intensity . Control Group : participant group receive standard nutrition exercise recommendation Food Guide Pyramid National Cholesterol Education Program Step 1 diet reduce body weight increase physical activity .
